original_text: of whom the world was not worthy—wandering about in deserts and mountains, and in dens and caves of the earth.
korean_text: (이런 사람은 세상이 감당하지 못하느니라) 그들이 광야와 산과 동굴과 토굴에 유리하였느니라

sentences.original_text: of whom the world was not worthy—
wandering about in deserts and mountains
and in dens and caves of the earth.
